articles.author: Lynn Butler
articles.title: TIMELINE | From Ngidi to Smith and Boucher: How Black Lives Matter shook CSA
articles.description: Cricket South Africa confirmed the discrimination case against current Proteas coach Mark Boucher has been dropped. Sport24 looks at a timeline of developments at CSA over the last two years.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa confirmed it had dropped all charges against Proteas head coach Mark Boucher.
  • Boucher was charged with the role he played in the alleged discrimination following … [+12377 chars]
